name: Line Light
description:
Line Light is a short pixel-art horror platformer

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Z: Jump

X: Toggle Light

Line Light was built using a Pocket C.H.I.P.  during the Locomojam 2019 on a train with no power points or wifi from Brisbane to Melbourne over 36 hours.

Made by: https://twitter.com/d_kilford
